extendedInfo.description: Need some help when it comes to playing your favorite word game? Auto Words With Friends Cheat was designed to help you get the best possible words while playing Words With Friends. By using the actual dictionary from the game, this app ensures that all results returned will be valid words. In fact, we guarantee that this app will get you the highest score possible for your rack every single time.  Impress all your friends with the great words you can come up with!Using this app couldn't be easier!Step 1: Take a screenshot of an in-progress game of Words With FriendsStep 2: Use this app to automatically read your screenshot to instantly import all letters and words from the board and rack of your WWF gameStep 3: Play the best word and dominate your opponents! They'll never know you're cheating, since the app also provides definitions for the words!In addition to having the best dictionary of any Words With Friends helper app in the Play Store, this app uses the most intuitive and efficient way to import your games.  Simply take a screenshot of your game (instructions on how to do this for each phone can be found within the app), then Auto Words Cheat will analyze your board and output the best possible words nearly instantaneously!  This app will work with ANY phone or tablet, and doesn't require any extra work on your end to set up.  What other Words With Friends or Scrabble cheat app can say that?  (Hint: none, because our board/grid solver with screenshot importing makes this the best WWF cheat app around!)  This app works so fast that you can even discreetly use it while you're hanging with your friends.Clicking on the define button for any of the words generated by Auto Words With Friends Cheats will bring up their definition, so you never have to worry about being exposed as a cheater. Everyone knows it isn't cheating if you know the definition!The intuitive "In-game mode" feature that allows you to go back and forth between playing the game and getting help. Whenever this button is clicked, Words With Friends is launched and a notification that lets you quickly come back to get help with your next rack goes into the status bar.Please note that this app includes a completely optional in-app upgrade.  If you wish to see all of the top words, a one-time $0.99 purchase will unlock them all forever.  If you don't wish to upgrade, you can still easily win 99.9% of your games. As with all epEK.ware apps, comments and feedback on Auto Words With Friends Cheat are always appreciated. A link to my email address can be found within the app.Note: This Words With Friends cheat app is in no way associated with Zynga, Inc, makers of the popular crossword-style word game Words With Friends.  Additionally, it is only compatible with Words With Friends for now (support for EA's Scrabble and WordFeud is planned for a future update).

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: this is an awesome app, easy and fast. And the best part is no pesky ads!!
reviews.author: Sarah Olsen

reviews.title: user friendly
reviews.comment: of these types of apps this one is probably the best because of its ease of operation and affordability.
reviews.author: Mike Travesi

reviews.title: Easy to use
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried other apps and this is the best free one so far.  It\'s not like those \"free\" ones that give you high point words for the first couple of times you use it, then they want you to pay for the app.  If you don\'t, they give you the low point words.
reviews.author: Stacy D

reviews.title: Great in a pinch
reviews.comment: I try to use my own brain, but this app helps for those tough last moves.
reviews.author: Carrie Higgins

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Very sneaky and easy to use! Love it! Works great! Love how you can set it to delete the picture when using the app.
reviews.author: Bryce Hagan

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Now I\'m memorizing some of the unusual combos and don\'t have to look them up ...but this has been super useful app \342\231\241 it....make sure when you screen shot the screeen ia not magnified or it won\'t work
reviews.author: Elena Diaz

reviews.comment: I\'d like it beget if we got a free trial of the full version. Other than that, it\'s a great app, probably the best!
reviews.author: Terry Wilson

reviews.title: Awesome App
reviews.comment: Just the kind of app I would recommend for the player to hone his/her word skills.
reviews.author: Jamie Cloutier

reviews.title: Could be better.....
reviews.comment: Shots don\'t take too often, it\'s frustrating to have to redo so much.
reviews.author: Kerolyn Klein

reviews.title: Great Helper
reviews.comment: This is a great app, however the words definitely need to be updated. If the word June isn\'t an acceptable word, something is wrong. Too many complex words and not enough common everyday words. Please add more... Thanks
reviews.author: chandra moore

reviews.title: Great cheat!
reviews.comment: Granted, it is worth it, but, it would be nice if they would mention you need to pay 99 cents to unlock high scoring words...
reviews.author: Aaron F

reviews.title: Helps
reviews.comment: Helps but can steal the fun out the game, I advice only to use when you absolutely think there\'s no moves to play. Help taught me the game a tile placement
reviews.author: Deon Smith

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: This is a brilliant app. A guilty pleasure to use.
reviews.author: John Howe

reviews.title: Awesome tech support
reviews.comment: I had an issue uploading a pic. Sent request for help. Not only was it addressed but he gave me an explanation. Big ups!!!!
reviews.author: Michael DeLisio

reviews.title: First class app makes word that much more fun. Thanks
reviews.comment: Bravo
reviews.author: Willy Rex

reviews.title: Fun game
reviews.comment: Needs strategic options so as not to show all the plays that leave triple words open.
reviews.author: Rico Devereaux

reviews.title: Painless
reviews.comment: Works quickly and well when I need to use it
reviews.author: Anthony Wallace

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: This app is simple easy to use.
reviews.author: greg klang

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Great App.  Support has been excellent
reviews.author: Rick Oelkers

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: One of the best I\'ve tried, worth the 99 cent upgrade.  Only wish it would open to the current active game when used instead of having to reactivate  it every time. App creator was also helpful when I screwed up my data and lost the paid version
reviews.author: William Weeks
